comment._content: I'd riot too if someone upped all the food prices... We've added your photo to our favorites and to our photo collection related to food prices.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo from the 1911 Food Price Riots of St. Quentin, France:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163540412/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: On August 30, 1911, Fifteen hundred weavers from Isle, a suburb of St. Quentin, France, marched into town and sacked 80 shops where they found food prices too high. News item in the New York Times, August 31, 1911: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D01E3DA1531E2...
